alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:18PM CDT until June 14 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 617 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clio to near Doster to 9 miles northwest of Fort Rucker to 6 miles east of Andalusia to 13 miles southwest of Red Level, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Geneva, Hartford, Taylor, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Samson, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Esto, Madrid, Gordon, Coffee Springs and Black. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
